backend/main.mo: Defines types for advancement rules and round-robin configs, and provides functions to add groups, stages, and store round‑robin stage configurations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying shared styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Routes between setup, schedule, full schedule, and knockout views based on store state and includes a toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdvancementConfi: UI dialog allowing users to configure per‑stage winner and runner‑up advancement destinations.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing page container styling and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/KnockoutPairingE: Editor for automatic or manual pairing of teams in the first knockout round using qualification data.
frontend/src/components/MatchDateTimeEdi: Small editor component for setting a match’s date and time with store updates.
frontend/src/components/RoundRobinGroupT: Renders editable round-robin groups with inline team name editing and consistent row heights per group.
frontend/src/components/Stage2GroupAssig: Displays a preview of how winners and runner-ups advance across stages using store configuration.
Builds and downloads a JSON export of a stage’s groups and team names.
frontend/src/features/tournament/generat: Generates all round-robin stages, groups, and matches, then constructs knockout matches based on advancement rules.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupNa: Provides alphabetical group naming utilities with optional offset for multi‑stage continuity.
frontend/src/features/tournament/knockou: Creates knockout bracket matches using qualified teams, supporting multiple rounds and pairing modes.
Defines canonical knockout round names, order, and helper functions for round identification.
frontend/src/features/tournament/matchCo: Computes total match counts across all round‑robin and knockout stages with detailed breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/tournament/qualifi: Computes which teams qualify for knockout rounds and counts how many advance based on stage advancement rules.
frontend/src/features/tournament/roundRo: Generates all round-robin match pairings within a group for a given stage.
frontend/src/features/tournament/types.t: Defines all tournament-related data types including teams, stages, advancement rules, and knockout structures.
frontend/src/features/tournament/useTour: Zustand store managing tournament state, configuration, team generation, match updates, and knockout settings.
frontend/src/features/tournament/validat: Validates team counts, round configs, advancement rules, and formats advancement labels for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for backend query integration; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with query and identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/FullSchedulePage.tsx: Displays the full tournament schedule, grouping knockout matches by round and showing round‑robin stages with their groups and matches.
frontend/src/pages/KnockoutPage.tsx: Shows the knockout bracket, validates qualified team counts, groups matches by round, and provides navigation and reset controls.
frontend/src/pages/StageSchedulePage.tsx: Shows stage 1 group assignments with editable team names and navigation to the full schedule or setup, including a reset option.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentSetupPage.t: Handles tournament configuration including team counts, round-robin setups, advancement rules, knockout stages, and generation/reset actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app state, features, requirements, and advancement rules for the tournament system.
